author: Alicia A. Caldwell
title: No, Californians, Sheltering in Place Doesn’t Include Hiking in Crowds - The Wall Street Journal
description: No, Californians, Sheltering in Place Doesn’t Include Hiking in Crowds The Wall Street Journal As Coronavirus Cases Add Up, California Frantically Counts Tests, Beds and Masks The New York Times Coronavirus: Gov. Newsom closes parking at some state parks and …
content:
LOS ANGELESSouthern Californias always-jammed roads were eerily quiet the first weekend of a statewide lockdown meant to slow the spread of the new coronavirus, but bumper-to-bumper traffic found a new venue: local hiking trails.
So many Californians headed … [+155 chars]
